it.polimi.se2019.client

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.client.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalModel

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocalModel
    The Model class contains a copy of the server's model, a game object. It provides the methods to update the local model.
    Author:
    andreahuang
